title: Elite Combat Achievements

properties.name: description
properties.value: Elite Combat Achievements tasks require the player to have high combat levels, having high-level equipment available, as well as good knowledge of dealing with boss mechanics in addition to doing so under difficult restrictions to complete. Speed-based tasks and tasks for raids begin to appear as well.

content:
Elite Combat Achievements tasks require the player to have high combat levels, having high-level equipment available, as well as good knowledge of dealing with boss mechanics in addition to doing so under difficult restrictions to complete. Speed-based tasks and tasks for raids begin to appear as well.

Contents

  • 1 Requirements
  • 2 Tasks
  • 3 Rewards

Requirements[edit | edit source]

Items
  • Any demonbane weapon
  • Crystal halberd
  • Hespori seed for every successful kill at Hespori
  • Rune thrownaxe
  • Salve amulet
  • Verac's flail
Skills
  • 65 Farming to defeat Hespori
  • 94 Magic for Ice Barrage and Vengeance
  • 95 Slayer(not boostable)
Quests/Favour
  • 60% Arceuus favour for Inferior Demonbane in the Arceuus spellbook; A Kingdom Divided unlocks more powerful demonbane spells
  • 60% Hosidius favour to defeat Hespori
  • Desert Treasure for Ancient spellbook
  • The Frozen Door
  • Dragon Slayer II
  • The Fremennik Exiles
  • Haunted Mine
  • Monkey Madness II
  • Song of the Elves


Tasks[edit | edit source]

There are a total of 112 elite-tier tasks for the Combat Achievements system, the highest amount among all six task sets.

Monster Name Description Category
Abyssal Sire Perfect Sire Kill the Abyssal Sire without taking damage from the external tentacles, miasma pools, explosion or damage from the Abyssal Sire without praying the appropriate protection prayer. Perfection
Abyssal Sire Demonic Rebound Use the Vengeance spell to reflect the damage from the Abyssal Sire's explosion back to him. Mechanical
Abyssal Sire Respiratory Runner Kill the Abyssal Sire after only stunning him once. Mechanical
Abyssal Sire Abyssal Veteran Kill the Abyssal Sire 50 times. Kill count
Alchemical Hydra Alchemical Veteran Kill the Alchemical Hydra 75 times. Kill count
Basilisk Knight Reflecting on This Encounter Kill a Basilisk Knight. Kill count

Cerberus Cerberus Veteran Kill Cerberus 75 times. Kill count

Dagannoth Prime Death to the Seer King Kill Dagannoth Prime whilst under attack by Dagannoth Supreme and Dagannoth Rex. Mechanical

Theatre of Blood (Entry) Pass It On In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, successfully pass on the green ball to a team mate. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) Attack, Step, Wait Survive Verzik Vitur's second phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without anyone getting bounced by Verzik. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) No-Pillar Survive Verzik Vitur's pillar phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without losing a single pillar. Mechanical

Theatre of Blood (Entry) Just To Be Safe Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode after having split the big ball with your entire team. This must be done with a group size of at least 2. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) Nylocas, On the Rocks In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, freeze any 4 Nylocas with a single Ice Barrage spell. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) Chally Time Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode by using a crystal halberd special attack as your final attack. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) They Won't Expect This In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, enter the Pestilent Bloat room from the opposite side. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) Appropriate Tools Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode with everyone having a salve amulet equipped. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (Entry) Anticoagulants Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without letting any bloodspawn live for longer than 10 seconds. Mechanical
Thermonuclear smoke devil Spec'd Out Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil using only special attacks. Restriction

TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges Facing Jad Head-on III Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's second challenge with only melee. Restriction

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • An antique lamp worth 25,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • A 5% increased chance to receive an elite clue scroll from all sources (excluding implings)
  • Ghommal's hilt 4
    • Three daily teleports to Mor Ul Rek (within the inner city)
  • Like a boss slayer unlock will now allow players to have up to 43 boss kills (a +8 increase) when assigned a boss task
  • God Wars Dungeon benefits:
    • God Wars Dungeon boss entrances now require 36 follower kill count to enter instead of 38
    • Ecumenical key drop rate is now increased from 1/55 to 1/50
    • Coin cost for God Wars Dungeon privately rented instances is reduced from 150,000 to 125,000 coins
  • Ability to create a dragon hunter crossbow (t) by combining it with Vorkath's head
  • Ghommal can make players a Tztok slayer helmet
